name: Trough The Desert
description:
Hello! Here is our game for ld39. It is not finished as we wanted but it is playable..

--------Controls---------

Editor : 

- Mouse middle for move the camera

- Left click for put ship part

-Right click for remove part

Launching ramp :

- Arrow Top/Down for move the ramp

- Space for launch the ship

In Flight:

- Arrow for move

-Space for use engine  (Consumes energy)

The goal is to reach the oasis
